upload.title: Upload Content
upload.description: Upload your movies or TV series to share with the world
upload.selectTypeHelp: Choose a type to upload. You will be taken to a dedicated page to complete the upload.
upload.movieBrief: A movie upload lets you publish feature-length films with a single file, cover art, metadata, and optional subtitles. Ideal for standalone releases.
upload.seriesBrief: A TV series upload supports multiple episodes and season metadata. Use this to publish episodic content with per-episode files and descriptions.
upload.clickOrDrag: Click to upload or drag and drop
upload.noCoverSelected: No cover selected. You may also paste an external URL into the coverUrl field later if needed.
upload.videoPrivacy: Your Video Will Remain Private Until It Is Published
upload.actorsPlaceholder: Actor Names eg: John Doe, Jane Smith

section1.title: Acceptance of Terms
section1.content1: By accessing and using OtalkTV ("the Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the Service.
section1.content2: These terms apply to all users, including visitors, registered users, and content uploaders.

section2.title: User Accounts
section2.content1: To access certain features, you must create an account. You agree to:
section2.item2: Maintain the security of your password
section2.item3: Be responsible for all activities under your account
section2.item4: Notify us immediately of unauthorized use
section2.content2: You must be at least 13 years old to use this Service. Users under 18 should use the Service under parental supervision.

section3.title: Content and Usage
section3.content1: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to access and use the Service for personal, non-commercial purposes.
section3.item1: Copy, distribute, or modify any content without authorization
section3.item2: Use automated systems to access the Service
section3.item6: Harass, abuse, or harm other users

section4.title: Content Upload and Ownership
section4.content1: When you upload content, you represent and warrant that:
section4.item1: You own or have the necessary rights to the content
section4.item2: The content does not violate any laws or third-party rights
section4.item3: The content does not contain malware or harmful code
section4.content2: By uploading content, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, distribute, and display your content on the Service.
section4.content3: We reserve the right to remove any content that violates these terms or is otherwise objectionable at our sole discretion.

section5.title: Intellectual Property
section5.content: All content, trademarks, logos, and intellectual property on the Service are owned by OtalkTV or its licensors. You may not use, copy, or distribute any intellectual property without explicit permission.

section6.title: Copyright Infringement
section6.content: We respect intellectual property rights. If you believe content on our Service infringes your copyright, please contact us with:
section6.item4: A statement of good faith belief

section7.title: Privacy
section7.content: Your use of the Service is also governed by our Privacy Policy. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect and use your information.

section8.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
section8.content: THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND. WE DO NOT WARRANT THAT:
section8.item1: The Service will be uninterrupted or error-free
section8.item3: The Service is free of viruses or harmful components
section8.item4: Results from using the Service will be accurate or reliable

section9.title: Limitation of Liability
section9.content: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, WE SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES, INCLUDING LOSS OF PROFITS, DATA, OR USE, ARISING FROM YOUR USE OF THE SERVICE.

section10.title: Termination
section10.content: We may suspend or terminate your account at any time for violations of these terms or for any other reason at our discretion. Upon termination:
section10.item1: Your right to use the Service immediately ceases
section10.item2: We may delete your account and content
section10.item3: You remain liable for any outstanding obligations

section11.title: Governing Law
section11.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your Jurisdiction], without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

section12.title: Changes to Terms
section12.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of material changes. Your continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

section13.title: Contact Information
section13.content: For questions about these Terms, please contact us at:

section1.title: Information We Collect
section1.content1: When you register for an account, we collect:
section1.item4: Profile information you choose to provide
section1.content2: We automatically collect information about how you use our service:

section2.title: How We Use Your Information
section2.content: We use the collected information to:
section2.item1: Provide and maintain our streaming service
section2.item3: Improve our platform and user experience
section2.item4: Communicate with you about updates and features

section3.title: Information Sharing
section3.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
section3.item1: Service Providers: With third-party vendors who help us operate our platform
section3.item2: Legal Requirements: When required by law or to protect our rights
section3.item3: Business Transfers: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets

section4.title: Data Security
section4.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information:
section4.item2: Secure password storage using hashing algorithms

section5.title: Cookies and Tracking
section5.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to:
section5.content2: You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

section6.title: Your Rights
section6.item3: Request deletion of your account and data

section7.title: Children's Privacy
section7.content: Our service is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you believe we have collected information from a child under 13, please contact us immediately.

section8.title: International Data Transfers
section8.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your data in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

section9.title: Changes to This Policy
section9.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date. Your continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

section10.title: Contact Us
section10.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:
